name: Elf Games Roulette
description:
Jingle the Elf should be thrilled; he's been selected to play on Elf Games! If he succeeds, then he gets all the paid time off that he wants. Wanda the Krampus doesn't seem that bad of a host.

There is a problem: each mini-game that he chooses has a price. What will you choose to help Jingle get that victory?
